free.question: Is Konectr free to use?
free.answer: Yes! Konectr is free to join and use. We may offer premium features in the future, but the core experience of connecting with people will always be free.

safety.question: How do I know the people I meet are safe?
safety.answer: All users go through identity verification. All meetups happen at vetted public venues. We have a dedicated safety team and zero-tolerance policy for inappropriate behavior.

introvert.question: What if I'm shy or introverted?
introvert.answer: Konectr is perfect for introverts! Since you're connecting over shared activities, there's always something to focus on besides small talk. Plus, small group sizes (2-4 people) keep things comfortable.

createMeetups.question: Can I create my own meetups?
createMeetups.answer: Absolutely! You can either join existing activities or create your own. Pick a venue, set a time, and let others join you.

cities.question: What cities is Konectr available in?
cities.answer: We're launching in select cities first and expanding quickly. Join the waitlist to be notified when we launch in your area!

difference.question: How is this different from Meetup or Bumble BFF?
difference.answer: Konectr focuses on real-time, spontaneous connections. No scheduling weeks ahead or swiping through profiles. See who's free now and meet up today.
